name: 3C south end, sunny room w/bath near T/BU Medical
neighborhood_overview: Located in Boston's south end, 5 minute walk to BU medical area. Easy access to orange line silver line T and buses on Mass Ave.
description:
Cozy room on 3rd floor 4rooms 2bath unit in an older brownstone building, minimum furnishing, shared 2 baths and kitchen. Located on a quiet one way street, you'll get a good night sleep here.

The space
room in modern unit with 3 other bed rooms, share 2 bath, kitchen, living/dining room.

Guest access
guest has their own bedroom, share kitchen, baths, living/dining room.
cups/forks/plates if not in the cabinets check the dish washer,
Free wi-fi.

Guests from ground floor may share the kitchen also.

Other things to note
Minimum furnishing, there are beds, end table/chair, linens are provided,
We are doing some renovation in upperer level, may have noise 9:30-5 M-Sat.
